name.baseName: Glyphosate ; Methanol phosphorus trichloride paraformaldehyde triethylamine, glycine ; Glycine Process ; All sizes; NESPS2
草甘膦 ; 甲醇三氯化磷多聚甲醛三乙胺、甘氨酸 ; 甘氨酸工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisShaped anaerobic reactor + A2/O process + chemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisShaped anaerobic reactor + A2/O process + chemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程涉及草甘膦的合成，草甘膦是一种广谱、系统性除草剂和作物脱水剂。它通常用于农业中，以杀死竞争作物的年生阔叶杂草和草本植物。该过程描述了使用甲醇、三氯化磷、多聚甲醛、三乙胺和甘氨酸等试剂。这个全面的工业路径适用于所有规模的草甘膦生产。末端治理技术，包括形状厌氧反应器和A2/O工艺，然后通过化学沉淀，用于处理氮和有机物质污染物，实现了94%的污染物管理技术效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,三级代码263.0文件，在完整版文件中第2928页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为草甘膦，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisShaped anaerobic reactor + A2/O process + chemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是定型厌氧反应器类+A2/O工艺+化学沉淀法，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮
